name: Spunky Dinosaur VS Spooky Pumpkins
description:
Due to global warming, all the pumpkins this year turn out to be evil spirits. In order to save the world, Dr. Dino invented a special fire gun to burn the evil spirits to death and clean up our Halloween! 

Press "Ctrl" to fire!  Press "Up", "Down", "Left" and "Right" to move Dr. Dino.

Let's help Dr. Dino clean up those evil spirits!!!
